info.name: Unblur NSFW on hover - Nexusmods
info.description: Unblur NSFW when hovering the cursor over NSFW media in Nexus mods, make sure the blur NSFW images feature in settings is enabled, this will also make gallery images unblurred by default when you enlarge them, meaning only thumbnails are blurred and you can obviously hover them to unblur. my name is RedSpearXIII on the Nexusmods forums, feel free to ask for any improvements or suggestions.
